name: Black Devil
description: Black Devil is powerfull chat bot for WhatsApp. Super bot Made in sri lanka userbot for Whatsapp and Working perfectly

SUDO.description: If you don't know how to use it, leave it blank! SUDO mode; Your number must be an international number. So you have to have your number after the country code. Example: 947xxxxxxxx (Sri lanka No. 94)

AUTO_STICKER.description: If you like Auto Sticker you can write 'true'. Otherwise false

BOT_NAME.description: give a name you desire to give your bot (for auto reply  to identify)

LANGUAGE.description: Enter your language. SI - Sinhala | EN - English | ES - Spanish(ag)

AUTO_BIO.description: Set AUTO BIO . Add this a live clock for your WhatsApp about.

HANDLERS.description: Enter bot prefix to use all commands.

AI_BOT.description: To enable / disable the AI chat this bot. Use true to enable AI chat bot and false to deactivate AI chat bot.

SEND_READ.description: Do you want to show user whether bot message seen or not?

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: https://dashboard.heroku.com/account Click this link. Scroll down for the API key. Then click the Reveal button. Copy the API key and paste the API Key empty box below.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Use the same App name as first.

MUTE_MESSAGE.description: Message received when mute a group. If you don't want to change this message, type default.

BLOCK_CHAT.description: Select the chat where the bot does not work. Ex: 947xxxxxxxx && 947xxxxxxxx ‡∑Ñ‡∑ù 947xxxxxxxx,947xxxxxxxx

ANTI_BAD.description: Activate Anti-Bad word for your groups. (Use true or false)

WHATS_LINK_BLOCK.description: Activate Whatsapp link block for your groups. And protect your groups by bug bots.(Use true or false)

ALIVE_LOGO.description: Alive message logo. Enter your image link below to change the image. (Upload the image you want to https://imgbb.com and put that link here.)

WELCOME_GIF.description: Welcome message logo. Enter your image,video and Gif link below to change this. (Upload the image you want to https://imgbb.com and put that link here.)

BYE_GIF.description: Good Bye message logo. Enter your image link below to change the image. (Upload the image you want to https://imgbb.com and put that link here.)

UNMUTE_MESSAGE.description: Message received when unmuting a group.

BLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Modifiable chat block notification. If you don't want to change this message, type default.

UNBLOCK_MESSAGE.description: Modifiable chat unblock notification. If you do not want to change this message, type default.

WORK_TYPE.description: The bot works. If you use public, everyone can use this bot. If you use private, only you can use your bot.

EMOJI_COMMAND.description: You can change this Command list emojis.)

EMOJI_DESCRIPTION.description: You can change command list emojis.)

EMOJI_WARNING.description: You can change command list emojis.)

DEBUG.description: If you don't know this. Give it up.

PANEL_COMMAND.description: Customize commands list request command. Keep devil if you don't want to change.

REMOVE_BG_API_KEY.description: Here you go to this website remove.bg and sign up and get an API key. Leave the API key in this space.

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: The message you get when you check whether the bot is online or not. This is not necessaraly the case.

BAN_MESSAGE.description: The message you get when someone commands you as .ban and remove it. If you don't change this message, type default.

ADD_MESSAGE.description: If you don't  change this message, type default.

KICKMe_MESSAGE.description: If you don't  change this message, type default.

PROMOTE_MESSAGE.description: If you don't  change this message, type default.

DEMOTE_MESSAGE.description: If you don't  change this message, type default.

AFK_MESSAGE.description: If you don't  change this message, type default.

NO_ONLINE.description: This is not necessaraly the case.

COFFEEHOUSE_API_KEY.description: Give it up. We give you this.

TIME_ZONE.description: Type your Time Zone (Pass this Sri Lankan Users)

INBOX_BLOCK.description: Activate Inbox Block System true or false

MENU_INFO.description: write Some of Words about yor Bot You can Edite this
